snippet.title: Let's Play | Ninja Gaiden Black | Chapter 1
snippet.description:
Welcome to this Let's Play series that I'm doing of Ninja Gaiden Black. I will be taking you through this game one chapter at a time. I hope you enjoy it as much as I have playing and recording it.

Chapter 1: We see the ultimate Ninja, Ryu Hayabusa rush through The Shadow Ninja Clan's fortress to see his Uncle, Master Murai, to bring him current affairs with the whereabouts of his Father. Even though The Hayabusa Ninja Clan and The Shadow Ninja clan have a mutual understanding, they are not going to let Ryu slip past their defences so easily.

Get Ninja Gaiden Black: http://marketplace.xbox.com/en-GB/Product/Ninja-Gaiden-Black/66acd000-77fe-1000-9115-d802544307d8
Xbox 360 Gamertag: Psycho Smiffy
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Lee.Smiffy.Smith
Twitter: https://twitter.com/JasonRivers01
Swagbucks referral link: swagbucks.com/refer/xxxSmiffyxxx
